languages.text: По иронии судьбы после того, как Вольный Торговец вош{mf|ел|ла} в конклав Коронус, Хейнрикс ван Калокс оказался командиром над Лорд-капитаном. Он сполна насладился всеми предоставившимися ему возможностями помыкать и властвовать над своенравн{mf|ым|ой} Вольным Торговцем.

By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.
languages.original_text: По иронии судьбы после того, как Вольный Торговец вош{mf|ел|ла} в конклав Коронус, Хейнрикс ван Калокс оказался командиром над Лорд-капитаном. Он сполна насладился всеми предоставившимися ему возможностями помыкать и властвовать над своенравн{mf|ым|ой} Вольным Торговцем.

traits.locale_text: The irony of the circumstances was that after Rogue Trader entered the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became Lord Captain's commander. He enjoyed to the full all of opportunities to domineer over the Rogue Trader and order {mf|him|her} around, that opened to him.

The irony of the circumstances was that after Rogue Trader entered the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became Lord Captain's commander. He enjoyed to the full all of opportunities to domineer over the Rogue Trader and order {mf|him|her} around, that opened to him.

Highly ironically, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

Highly ironically, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

languages.text: 在命运的作弄下，当行商浪人加入科罗努斯密会后，海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯便成了{mf|他|她}的顶头上司。他非常乐于抓住每个机会，对行商浪人百般责难、呼来喝去。
languages.original_text: By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

traits.locale_text: 颇具讽刺意味的是，当行商浪人加入科罗努斯密会后，海因里希·冯·卡洛克斯便成了{mf|他|她}的顶头上司。他非常乐于抓住每个机会，对行商浪人百般责难、呼来喝去。

languages.text: Als {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich der Koronus-Konklave anschloss, wurde Heinrix van Calox zum kommandieren Offizier des Lord Captains — Ironie des Schicksals. Er nutzte mit diebischer Freude jede Gelegenheit, um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu tadeln und herumzukommandieren.
languages.original_text: By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

traits.locale_text: Als {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} sich der Koronus-Konklave anschloss, wurde Heinrix van Calox zum kommandieren Offizier des Lord Captains — Ironie des Schicksals. Er nutzte mit diebischer Freude jede Gelegenheit, um {mf|den Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu tadeln und herumzukommandieren.

languages.text: Par un caprice du destin, lorsque {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} rejoignit le Conclave de Koronus, Heinrix van Calox endossa le rôle de son officier commandant. Il se réjouit de ses nouvelles fonctions et tira parti de chaque occasion qui lui était donnée de châtier et de mener à la baguette {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}.
languages.original_text: By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

traits.locale_text: Paradoxalement, lorsque {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} rejoignit le Conclave de Koronus, Heinrix van Calox endossa le rôle de son officier commandant. Il se réjouit de ses nouvelles fonctions et tira parti de chaque occasion qui lui était donnée de châtier et de mener à la baguette {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine}.

languages.text: Por caprichos del destino, cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se unió al Cónclave de Koronus, Heinrix van Calox se convirtió en el oficial al mando de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Se deleitó con cada oportunidad de reprender y dar órdenes a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.
languages.original_text: By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

traits.locale_text: De forma muy irónica, cuando {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se unió al Cónclave de Koronus, Heinrix van Calox se convirtió en el oficial al mando de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Se deleitó con cada oportunidad de reprender y dar órdenes a{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente.

languages.text: 運命のいたずらによって自由開拓者がコロヌス評議会に参加したとき、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスはロード・キャプテンの指揮官となった。喜び勇んだ彼は、何かにつけては自由開拓者を懲らしめるかのようにこき使った。
languages.original_text: By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

traits.locale_text: 運命のいたずらによって自由開拓者がコロヌス評議会に参加したとき、ハインリックス・ヴァン・カロックスはロード・キャプテンの指揮官となった。喜び勇んだ彼は、何かにつけては自由開拓者を懲らしめるかのようにこき使った。

languages.text: Hür Tacir, Koronus Meclisi'ne katıldığında kaderin cilvesiyle Heinrix van Calox da Lord Kaptan'ın komuta subayı oldu. Hür Tacir'i azarlamak ve ona emirler yağdırmak için bulduğu her fırsatı mutlulukla değerlendirdi.
languages.original_text: By a twist of fate, when the Rogue Trader joined the Koronus Conclave, Heinrix van Calox became the Lord Captain's commanding officer. He gleefully took advantage of every opportunity to chastise and order the Rogue Trader around.

traits.locale_text: Hür Tacir, Koronus Meclisi'ne katıldığında, kaderin cilvesiyle Heinrix van Calox da Lord Kaptan'ın komuta subayı oldu. Hür Tacir'i azarlamak ve ona emirler yağdırmak için bulduğu her fırsatı mutlulukla değerlendirdi.
